member.name: M:ExoPlanetHunter.Web.Controllers.PlanetsController.Get(Microsoft.AspNet.OData.Query.ODataQueryOptions)
member.remarks:
E.g if you want to find habitable planets "$filter= Habitable eq true".
Find planet with name 14 And b "$filter=Name eq '14 And b'".
Read more here: https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/hh169248(v=nav.90).aspx.
Skip and top E.g takes 30 and skips 10 "$top=30 $skip=10".
Order by ascending discovery year $orderby=Disc_Year asc.

member.name: M:ExoPlanetHunter.Web.Controllers.StarsController.Get(Microsoft.AspNet.OData.Query.ODataQueryOptions)
member.remarks:
E.g if you want to find all planets at a distance greater then 110 an less than 140 then use "$filter=Distance gt 110 and Distance lt 140".
Find star with name SR 12 AB "$filter=Name eq 'SR 12 AB'".
Read more here: https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/hh169248(v=nav.90).aspx
Skip and top E.g takes 30 and skips 10 "$top=30 $skip=10".
Order by decending number of planets $orderby=Planets desc.
